synopsis.text:
Cultural Affairs in order to support training animators.

In the heartwarming tale of courage and friendship, young Masaya, a first-grader with a towering stature but a tender heart, finds himself dependent on his petite yet resilient second-grade friend, Akiyo, to navigate the daunting path to school. Masaya, inspired by Akiyo's strength, yearns to emulate her bravery. However, an unexpected event leaves Akiyo in distress, compelling Masaya to embark on a daring quest to the far-off Ipponsugi forest. His mission: to locate the cherished spotted bellflowers that hold a special place in Akiyo's heart. As Masaya ventures into the unknown, he learns that the world is filled with countless unexplored paths waiting to be discovered. This enchanting anime, one of the four 2014 Anime Mirai projects, is a testament to the power of friendship and determination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
